summary: A collection of pytest test suites that verify the functionality and robustness of various API job components, including base job handling, file/message/download operations, source deletion, metadata synchronization, star/unstar actions, and reply uploads, with extensive coverage of authentication, network errors, timeouts, retries, cryptographic processing, and data integrity checks.
business_intent: To guarantee reliable and secure interactions with the backend API of a secure communication platform by automatically testing that each job correctly handles success cases and a wide range of failure scenarios, thereby preventing data loss, unauthorized access, and service disruptions.
